The companyDecentralized data is the future. Data mesh is the right idea. We’re here to make it a reality. Nextdata OS is a data-mesh-native platform built to meet the challenge of decentralizing data at scale. We are inventing a new way for developers to work with data and share it responsibly via data product containers.Our vision is to build a world where AI/ML and analytics are powered by decentralized, responsible, and equitable data ownership, across boundaries of organizations, technology, and most importantly boundaries of trust.Our purpose is to change the experience of creating, sharing, discovering, and using data forever, to be connected, fast, and fair based on data mesh principles.Our technology is designed to empower data developers, users and owners with a delightful experience where data products are a first-class primitive, with trust built-in.We are here to accept the reality that the world of data is complex and messy; data models are out-of-date the moment they are created; data is owned across trust boundaries; data is stored on different platforms; data is used in many different modes and most importantly data can't protect itself. We are here to recognize that past approaches to tackle these complexities with centralized data collection, modeling and governance are ineffective at best and pathologically unfair at worst. We are here to reimagine, with you!About The RoleAs the Principal Architect at NextData, you will be a pivotal force in shaping our technology strategy and product architecture. Collaborating closely with our CEO, product and engineering teams, you will lead the way in making high-level technical decisions, contributing to the code, designing innovative solutions, and driving the overall architectural direction of our products.You will leverage your deep expertise in large scale distributed systems and databases as well as your experience working with the modern data stack to design and implement the NextdataOS which can be delivered on top of the existing data stacks in the largest enterprises of the world.You Are The Right Fit If You Have-10+ Years strong background in designing and delivering large-scale PaaS/SaaS commercial products-Extensive experience as a chief architect or principal engineer in a tech startup or digital-native environmentExperience in designing and delivering large-scale PaaS/SaaS commercial productsDeep understanding of the data/analytics/ML product landscape, trends, and architectureDemonstrated architectural mindset with a balance of high-level strategyStrong source code contributorTrack record of contributing significantly as a source code contributorPrior experience collaborating closely with product teams for feasibility assessment and architectureExperience and feel comfortable thriving in an early-stage startup environmentExcellent communication and collaboration skillsIf you're an accomplished Principal Architect who thrives on shaping architectural strategy, fostering technical excellence, and redefining how data is managed and utilized, we invite you to join us at NextData. Your leadership, technical prowess, and commitment to revolutionizing data ownership will play an instrumental role in our mission to transform the data landscape.Travel: In general, travel is not anticipated for this role with exception to regular company-wide events/meetings.Our BenefitsWe are an early stage company, but we don't subsist on ramen! We are an experienced team with families. We provide $2,000 for your home workspace setup, company laptop, premium health, vision, and dental insurance coverage for you and your family. As an early stage start up, you will receive a compensation package that includes a competitive salary and equity in Nextdata.
